entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
